
#include<iostream>
#include<cstring>
#include<cstdio>

using namespace std;
int main()
{
               string a,b;
                int c[21000],all[10][10005];
                long long int u,l,l1,l2,i,j,zero,carry,pos,ans,p,flag,sub;
                cin>>u;
                getchar();
                while(u--)
                {         cin>>a>>b;
                        sub=0;
                        if(a[0]=='-' && b[0]!='-')
                           sub=1;
                            else
                             if(a[0]!='-' && b[0]=='-')
                             sub=1;
                             if(a[0]=='-')
                             a=a.substr(1);
                             if(b[0]=='-')
                             b=b.substr(1);
                          l1=a.length();
                          l2=b.length();
                          l=l1+l2;
                          for(p=0;p<=9;p++)
                          {for(i=l1-1;i>=0;i--)
                          {all[p][i]=0;}}
                          zero=0;
                          for(p=0;p<=9;p++)
                          {                carry=0;
                                           pos=0;
                                           for(i=l1-1;i>=0;i--)
                                           {
                                                     ans=((a[i]-48)*p)+carry;
                                                     all[p][pos]=all[p][pos]+ans;
                                                     carry=all[p][pos]/10;
                                                  all[p][pos]=all[p][pos]%10;
                                                  pos++;
                                           }
                                           all[p][pos]=carry;
                          }

                          for(i=0;i<l;i++)
                          c[i]=0;
                          zero=0;
                          pos=zero;
                          for(i=l2-1;i>=0;i--)
                          {                 pos=zero;
                                           carry=0;
                                           for(j=0;j<=l1;j++)
                                           {
                                                   c[pos]=c[pos]+all[b[i]-48][j]+carry;
                                                   carry=c[pos]/10;
                                                   c[pos]=c[pos]%10;
                                                   pos++;
                                                   }

                                           zero++;
                          }
                          flag=0;
                          if(sub==1)
                          printf("-");
                          for(p=l-1;p>=0;p--)
                          {                  if(c[p]==0 && flag==0)
                                             continue;
                                             {flag=1;
                                             printf("%d",c[p]);
                                             }
                          }
                          if(flag==0)
                          cout<<"0";
                                             printf("\n");

}
}
